name: SMALL UV reactive DreamWeaver (FREE SHIPPING)
description:
ALL PRODUCTS ARE CURRENT ON HOLD FOR ONE YEAR, WHILE LUNA FOCUSES ON TRAINING IN CIRCUS SCHOOL. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE. 

ALL HOOPS ARE COLLAPSIBLE FOR EASY TRAVEL

See it collapsed HERE: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=f7616KRzeF8

What could be better then a UV Blacklight Reactive DreamWeaver?...A Collapsible UV reactive DreamWeaver!

These hoop look absolutely stunning in both day time lighting, AND blacklight. Perfect for stage performance and fun.

TUBING COLORS:

Orbit Blue UV
Bright Green UV
Saturn Yellow UV
Glow UV (looks clear in daylight, glows blue/white in UV)
Tangerine UV (Glows yellow/orange)
Ultra Pink UV (Glows Orange)
Magenta UV (Glows Redish Pink)

UV STRING OPTIONS:
Neon yellow/green
Neon Orange
Neon Pink
White (glow is not as distinct as the others)

HOOP DETAILS:

The hoop is COLLAPSIBLE for easy travel. It breaks down into 8 small sections, all of which can fit in a yoga bag! This hoop is actually easier to carry then a large hula hoop, and can fit in checked or carry-on luggage.

Assembly is made easy by simple push button connectors allowing you to put it together quickly and with ease.


SMALL(SM):
Inner Ring is 29" OD
Collapsed Length: 37.5"
Weight: 2.5pounds

*****(Remember that even if you do not hoop with a small hoop, the extra weight from the additional outer ring will make up for the size.)

MATERIAL: The hoop is constructed out of ridged polypro tubing making the hoop very light for it's size.

TAPE COLOR: These hoop are not taped/ They come Sanded.

If you have any questions or comments please contact Luna at Brie@LunaBreezeperformance.com

name: THE ORGANIC (FREE SHIPPING)
description:
ALL PRODUCTS ARE CURRENT ON HOLD FOR ONE YEAR, WHILE LUNA FOCUSES ON TRAINING IN CIRCUS SCHOOL. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE. 

ALL HOOPS ARE COLLAPSIBLE FOR EASY TRAVEL

See it collapsed in the video section.

Please allow a maximum of 3-4 weeks to receive your order. 

DETAILS:

The hoop is COLLAPSIBLE for easy travel. It breaks down into 8 small sections, all of which can fit in a yoga bag! This hoop is actually easier to carry then a large hula hoop, and can fit in checked or carry-on luggage.

Assembly is made easy by simple push button connectors allowing you to put it together quickly and with ease.

SIZE: Two Sizes

MEDIUM:
Inner Ring is 32" OD 
Collapsed Length: 42"
Weight: 3 pounds

SMALL:
Inner Ring is 29" OD
Collapsed Length: 37.5"
Weight: 2.5pounds

*****(Remember that even if you do not hoop with a small hoop, the extra weight from the additional outer ring will make up for the size.)

MATERIAL: The hoop is constructed out of ridged polypro tubing making the hoop very light for it's size.

TAPE COLOR: Chrome Silver. (Only included in the "WITH TAPE" option.)

WEBBING COLOR: Current Available Colors are White, Taxi Yellow, Forest Green, and Neon pink(UV), yellow-green(UV), and Neon orange(UV).

name: Hula-Hoop Travel Duffel
description:
ALL PRODUCTS ARE CURRENT ON HOLD FOR ONE YEAR, WHILE LUNA FOCUSES ON TRAINING IN CIRCUS SCHOOL. SORRY FOR THE INCONVENIENCE. 

This is an all purpose hula hoop duffel bag perfect for travel with multiple hoops! Fits anywhere from 1-14 hula hoops at once, and upto 30 pounds of gear. 

Features

-Zips all the way up so you can store a sleeping bag, clothing or anything else as well as your hoops. (This way, you only need to check one bag on the plane, without dealing with trying to carry on hoops.)

-An Inner pocket is sewn into the front inside flap of the bag. It is a perfect place to store LED chargers, juggling balls, hoop tape and more. 

-It's a back-pack and it's easy to carry.

-Made of thick canvas duffel material.

-Comes in a variety of colors including, light blue, black, cream, and olive green. 

-Fits collapsed DreamWeavers AND all your other hoops.


PERSONAL EXPERIENCE: 

After two months of heavy travel with my Hula-Hoop Travel duffel, I bid this item strong, practical and a must have when traveling! I put up to 40 pounds (Suggested limit is 30) of hula-hoops (12) and travel needs (sleeping bag, clothing etc.) in this bag and it's still intact! It was checked on 4 flights and 4 train rides over the last two months and was carried across 9 different cities. I'd say that was a good test! Plus, having the inner pocket to store my hula hoop charger, ipod, juggling balls, make-up, and fire hoop quick wicks, kept me organized and ready for performance!

XOXO -LUNA
